name: Mankind
summary:
Discover with MANKIND the finest elements of galactic strategy exclusively online. Be one of an infinite number of possible players in a universe where many are already immersed in battle and many more will join the ever-expanding game environment. 
 
In order to succeed, you will have to bring to your empire your strategic knowledge and tactical abilities by committing your life to the cause. Colonize your planets, develop your spatial and ground infrastructures, and manage your resources to Ensure the survival of your colonies whilst forging alliances with other members of your faction to protect your system.
